title: New Kid on the Block: 10 Steps to Help You Survive and Thrive in the First 100 Days of Your New Job
description: Providing strategies for overcoming fears, maximizing strengths, and taking advantage of the opportunities that present themselves in a new job, this guidebook offers direction on how to cope and succeed. It contains a 10-step plan to surviving the first 100 days by making the right first impression; developing good relationships with the boss, colleagues, and staff; learning the ropes; making necessary changes; and starting off with a focus. Highly accessible with an easy-to-follow plan, this program is aimed at building a solid platform for a new position.
author: Frances  Kay
